description: 1-minute demo: AI-powered personal shopping assistant with style profiling, real-time recommendations, and outfit coordination
trigger_phrases: Help me find the perfect outfit for a customer based on their style preferences and purchase history.

persona.name: Amanda Foster
persona.title: Personal Styling Director
persona.context: Leading team of 40 personal shoppers, seeking to scale personalized service with AI assistance

agents_utilized.description: Builds comprehensive style profiles from purchase history and preferences
Understands occasion requirements and matches to appropriate styles
Generates personalized product recommendations using AI matching
Creates complete outfit combinations with coordinating pieces
Checks real-time inventory and suggests alternatives
Optimizes offers and bundles for maximum value
Generates session summaries and follow-up recommendations

conversation_flow.user_message: Help me find the perfect outfit for a customer based on their style preferences and purchase history.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
I've analyzed Jennifer Hayes' complete style profile. She has a clear aesthetic with specific preferences.

**Customer Style Profile:**

| Attribute | Preference |
|-----------|------------|
| Style archetype | Modern Classic |
| Color palette | Neutrals, navy, burgundy |
| Fit preference | Tailored, not tight |
| Price range | $150-400 per piece |
| Preferred brands | Theory, Vince, Equipment |

**Size Information:**

| Category | Size | Notes |
|----------|------|-------|
| Tops | 6 / Small | Prefers relaxed fit |
| Bottoms | 28 / 6 | High-rise preferred |
| Dresses | 6 | Midi length |
| Shoes | 8 | Comfortable heels only |

**Recent Purchase Patterns:**
- Last purchase: 3 weeks ago (silk blouse)
- Avg items/visit: 2.4
- Return rate: 8% (well below average)
- Total spend (YTD): $4,200

**Style Notes from Past Sessions:**
"Loves structured pieces, avoids prints, prefers investment pieces over trends"

Source: [Purchase History + Style Profile + CRM Notes]
Agents: StyleProfileAgent, OccasionMatchingAgent

What occasion is she shopping for?

conversation_flow.user_message: She needs an outfit for a business dinner with clients
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Business dinner requirements analyzed. Here are personalized recommendations for Jennifer.

**Occasion Analysis:**

| Requirement | Recommendation |
|-------------|----------------|
| Dress code | Business elegant |
| Impression | Polished, confident |
| Comfort level | Seated dining, standing cocktails |
| Her preference | Structured, not stuffy |

**Top Picks for Jennifer:**

| Item | Brand | Price | Match Score |
|------|-------|-------|-------------|
| Wool crepe blazer | Theory | $375 | 96% |
| Silk shell top | Vince | $195 | 94% |
| Tailored ankle pant | Equipment | $285 | 92% |
| Midi sheath dress | Theory | $345 | 91% |

**Why These Selections:**
- Blazer: Her favorite Theory brand, structured silhouette she loves
- Shell: Navy (her color), pairs with blazer
- Pants: High-rise she prefers, versatile neutral
- Dress option: One-piece alternative, midi length

**Not Recommended:**
- Prints (she avoids)
- Fitted dresses (prefers relaxed)
- Trendy pieces (wants investment value)

Source: [Recommendation Engine + Occasion Database]
Agents: ProductRecommendationAgent, OccasionMatchingAgent

Want to see complete outfit combinations?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, show me complete outfit options with accessories
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Three complete outfits created based on Jennifer's style profile and the occasion.

**Outfit 1: Power Suiting (Her Go-To Style)**

| Piece | Item | Price |
|-------|------|-------|
| Blazer | Theory wool crepe | $375 |
| Top | Vince silk shell (navy) | $195 |
| Pants | Equipment tailored ankle | $285 |
| Shoes | Low block heel pump | $295 |
| Bag | Structured leather tote | $425 |
| **Total** | | **$1,575** |

**Outfit 2: Elegant Simplicity**

| Piece | Item | Price |
|-------|------|-------|
| Dress | Theory midi sheath | $345 |
| Blazer | Same Theory blazer | $375 |
| Shoes | Pointed kitten heel | $265 |
| Jewelry | Gold bar necklace | $125 |
| **Total** | | **$1,110** |

**Outfit 3: Modern Edge**

| Piece | Item | Price |
|-------|------|-------|
| Jumpsuit | Vince tailored | $395 |
| Belt | Leather waist | $145 |
| Earrings | Statement gold | $85 |
| Clutch | Evening leather | $295 |
| **Total** | | **$920** |

**Stylist Recommendation:** Outfit 1 - most aligned with her established style.

Source: [Outfit Coordination Engine + Style Rules]
Agents: OutfitCoordinationAgent, ProductRecommendationAgent

Check availability for her sizes?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, check inventory and see what's in stock for her size
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Inventory checked for Jennifer's sizes. Most items available with one alternative needed.

**Outfit 1 Availability (Her Sizes):**

| Item | Size | Status | Location |
|------|------|--------|----------|
| Theory blazer | 6 | In stock | This store |
| Vince shell | S | In stock | This store |
| Equipment pants | 28 | Low stock (2 left) | This store |
| Block heel pump | 8 | Out | Alternative below |

**Shoe Alternative:**
- Stuart Weitzman block heel - Size 8 in stock
- Same height, similar style, $315 (+$20)
- Customer has purchased this brand before (good fit)

**Outfit 2 Availability:**

| Item | Size | Status |
|------|------|--------|
| Theory midi sheath | 6 | In stock |
| Kitten heel | 8 | In stock |
| Gold necklace | One size | In stock |

**Outfit 3 Availability:**
- Jumpsuit only in size 4 here
- Can ship from warehouse (2 days)
- Or available at downtown location

**Recommendation:** Outfit 1 fully available today with shoe swap.

Source: [Inventory System + Store Network]
Agents: InventoryAvailabilityAgent, ProductRecommendationAgent

See pricing with her loyalty benefits?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, what's the best offer I can give her?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Pricing optimized with Jennifer's loyalty status and current promotions.

**Customer Status:**
- Loyalty tier: Platinum
- Points balance: 4,200 ($42 value)
- Active offers: 2

**Outfit 1 Optimized Pricing:**

| Item | Regular | Her Price | Savings |
|------|---------|-----------|--------|
| Theory blazer | $375 | $337 | 10% Platinum |
| Vince shell | $195 | $175 | 10% Platinum |
| Equipment pants | $285 | $256 | 10% Platinum |
| SW heels | $315 | $283 | 10% Platinum |
| Leather tote | $425 | $382 | 10% Platinum |

**Additional Offers:**

| Offer | Value | Conditions |
|-------|-------|------------|
| Bundle bonus | Extra 5% | 3+ pieces |
| Points redemption | -$42 | Use balance |
| Free alterations | $35 value | Platinum perk |

**Best Deal Package:**

| | Amount |
|---|--------|
| Original total | $1,595 |
| Platinum discount (10%) | -$159 |
| Bundle bonus (5%) | -$72 |
| Points applied | -$42 |
| **Final price** | **$1,322** |
| **Total savings** | **$273 (17%)** |

Source: [Pricing Engine + Loyalty System + Promotions]
Agents: PricingOptimizationAgent, InventoryAvailabilityAgent

Generate session summary?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, wrap up and save everything to her profile
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Shopping session complete. All selections saved to Jennifer's profile.

**Session Summary:**

| Accomplishment | Result |
|----------------|--------|
| Style profile applied | 5 preferences matched |
| Outfits created | 3 complete looks |
| Recommended outfit | Power Suiting (#1) |
| Availability confirmed | 4 of 5 in store |
| Savings delivered | $273 (17% off) |

**Saved to Profile:**
- Outfit 1: Saved as "Business Dinner Look"
- Outfits 2 & 3: Added to wishlist
- Size preferences: Confirmed accurate
- Brand note: Stuart Weitzman added

**Follow-Up Scheduled:**

| Trigger | Action | Timing |
|---------|--------|--------|
| New Theory arrivals | Notification | Automatic |
| Pants low stock | Alert | If not purchased |
| Wishlist items on sale | Email | When discounted |

**Stylist Notes Added:**
"Business dinner 11/26 - Power suiting recommended. Loves Theory blazer fit. Open to SW shoes as alternative to usual brands."

**Next Appointment:**
- Suggested: Pre-holiday shopping session
- Best timing: 2 weeks (new arrivals)

Source: [All Systems]
Agents: ShoppingSummaryAgent (orchestrating all agents)

Your personalized shopping session created 3 complete outfits with 96% style match, $273 in savings, and automated follow-ups for Jennifer's preferences.

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response

business_value.problem: Scaling personalized styling service, inconsistent recommendations, missed cross-sell opportunities, time-consuming profile lookups
business_value.solution: AI-powered personal shopping assistant with automated style profiling, occasion matching, and outfit coordination
business_value.roi: 96% style match accuracy, 17% customer savings through optimization, complete outfits in minutes vs hours
business_value.performance: Instant style profile analysis, 3 complete outfits generated, real-time inventory checks, automated follow-ups
